## Mission

Implement advanced export capabilities including PDF, batch exports, and scheduled delivery.

## Branch

`claude/wave3/export-enhance`

## Scope

- PDF generation for opportunities/contracts
- Batch export (multiple items)
- Scheduled export delivery
- Export templates

## Features

1. PDF export with branding
2. Excel/CSV batch export
3. Scheduled exports via email
4. Custom export templates

## Output

`docs/WAVE3_EXPORT_ENHANCE_COMPLETE.md`
